thread.title: BRIEF-Sirtex Medical Receives Formal Notification Regarding Acquisition Of Co

title: BRIEF-Sirtex Medical Receives Formal Notification Regarding Acquisition Of Co

organizations.name: brief-sirtex medical receives formal notification regarding acquisition of co

text: March 14, 2018 / 8:38 AM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Sirtex Medical Receives Formal Notification Regarding Acquisition Of Co Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 14 (Reuters) - Sirtex Medical Ltd: * ANNOUNCES FORMAL NOTIFICATION FROM U.S. FEDERAL TRADE COMMISSION & GERMAN FEDERAL CARTEL OFFICE ON PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF CO * U.S. FTC GRANTED EARLY TERMINATION OF WAITING PERIOD UNDER CLAYTON ACT & PREMERGER NOTIFICATION RULES WITH RESPECT TO SCHEME * GERMAN FCO CONFIRMED PROPOSED SCHEME DOES NOT FULFIL CONDITIONS FOR PROHIBITION PURSUANT TO ACT AGAINST RESTRAINTS OF COMPETITION * DRAFT SCHEME BOOKLET FOR SCHEME TO SELL CO TO VARIAN MEDICAL SYSTEMS, INC LODGED WITH ASIC ON MARCH 9 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
